answers.answer: I was told that I have it today too :( it was not a very good day for me either and I'm scared to eat anything
aww is yours high and do you have to prick youe finger?

She didn't tell me my exact numbers but I just found out I have it today and my next appointment is on Wednesday so I haven't started pricking my finger yet.. I'll probably have to start that after the next appointment. Do they give you a monitor to bring home with you?
yes i started tonight. i been having bad leg cramps traveling to my feet and above my knee. but my next apt iis thurs.  i have to do it 3x's a day. hows the baby? everything else is fine!

question: Today i started checking my BS bc| i got pregnamcy diabetes. its really getting to me bc its so much to do & the risks is scary!  i will pray harder for a safe delivery & my baby is very healthy. i just cant shake the feeling! smh. who else has it?
title: Bad Day. .
